item.title: Polyring
item.description: I’m a member of the Polyring as of today! Member of the Polyring webring For more informations please visit here.

item.title: Kotlin Adventures 1
item.description: This is the beginning of my adventure with Kotlin and Mobile Development. After years of working as a Microsoft Dynamics CRM/365 developer and teaching myself WPF, I wanted to try something entirely new: Mobile Development. Before I tell you how I did anything without prior knowledge, I want to talk about what my goal was for this app. I wanted to have an overview during a battle in DnD with easy access to the following information:

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome, dear reader to my new blog. Here I will tell tales about various adventures through IT. The main focus will be on programming projects but I plan to branch off to other topics as well. Have a great day!
